answer: For the full year 2024, Cosentyx's immunology segment net sales were USD 6,141 million (reported) and USD 6,209 million (constant currency). For the full year 2023, Cosentyx's immunology segment net sales were USD 4,204 million (reported) and USD 4,559 million (constant currency). The reported change from 2023 to 2024 was +8.14% and the change from 2024 to 2023 was -6.52% on a reported basis. The change on a reported and constant currency basis, respectively, was +23.58% for 2024 and -10.76% for 2023.
